attributes.action: BAN SMOKING IN THE WHOLE OF THE PARLIAMENT BUILDING IN LINE WITH THE BAN BEING IMPOSED ON THE REST OF THE NATION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE HEREBY CALL ON THE GOVERNMENT TO IMPOSE A COMPLETE BAN ON SMOKING IN ALL PARLIAMENTRY BUILDINGS TO ENSURE THAT POLITITIANS WHO VOTED IN FAVOUR OF A BAN AGAINST SMOKING IN ENGLAND ARE SEEN TO BE FAIR. WE EXPECT OUR POLITITIANS TO HAVE NO FAVOURS WHEN THEY HAVE IMPOSED THIS LAW ON THEIR TAXPAYERS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
